document_data.name: Koltz
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Koltz''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''I am never. Sleeping on duty. Again.''|Fist Koltz}}
document_data.Description: Koltz was a [[human]] man with dark skin and neatly trimmed bark brown beard. He wore a set of [[chainmail]] armor decorated with a [[tabard]] embroidered with the Flaming Fist insignia and a simple uniform [[helmet]]. Koltz wielded a [[spear]] and a large [[shield]] when on duty.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Koltz was stationed in the [[Basilisk Gate]]'s barracks and prison, serving under Blaze [[Liara Portyr]] and [[Manip Seyama]]. His Gauntlet supervisor caught Koltz sleeping on duty, for which he was punished by being forced to train half to death.
